file_content.text: Jedi Xerender hunts a crash site where lost clan Master is buried. Sith should be there. Sith should be finished with hunt.
Don't cross me.
Thank you.
You could be lying.
We feel Sith power. We know we fall, then we do not clean clan. There is no revenge.
Fetzellen hunts with Xerender. We need Sith to leave Fetzellen. He is our kill.
Enough! We are no match for Sith clan! We know humility.
I'm impressed with your skill and strength, Broonmark.
You fought well.
You'll live.
We cannot clean clan while dead. Our revenge cannot fail.
This is a lesson you'll only learn once.
Know your place!
Now we have respect.
Sith must have success. Sith must be out of our way. We know what Sith seeks, and we are sharing what we know.
No! These Talz are of our clan. These Talz follow Fetzellen. Sith blocks our hunt! Steals our kills!
We know Sith are fierce. Sith defeat us, brave Hoth terrain and arrive here first. But we must be clean. We must have revenge!
Sith fail to heed our warning! Undermine our cleansing. Does Sith block us deliberately?
I did not know I would face Talz here.
Our missions crossed.
If your targets are in my way, I'm going to kill them.
Deal with it.
Our clans must not cross. Sith must stop for good!
My apologies.
This must not occur. We need Sith out of our way.
We have new knowledge for Sith. We know where Jedi clan hunts. We are providing location to Sith.
We reject the Sith apology. Our clan must be cleansed. Our hunt must not be blocked. We must stop Sith now for good!
Many are dead today, but not Sith. Sith clan proves to be superior.
I'm impressed with your strength, Broonmark.
You are a fierce fighter.
We know something to help the Sith.
You're lucky you're not dead.
And I was holding back.
Yes. We are not the focus of Sith hunt. Sith crave Jedi clan.
That's the way it goes.
We learn humility today. We share what we know for Sith hunt.
Jedi Xerender does not seek a weapon. Xerender seeks another Jedi. A lost leader of the Jedi clan called Master Wyellett.
Now, we must end this delay. More of our clan must be clean today. More must be dead.
